::Spears::

She saw him frown. She laughed,"You know, that's a great idea. Let's 
rebuild the old ship into something better.  Cover the holes, giver 
her a new paint job.  I vote for bright pink paint personally.  
Rebuild her weapons. We can go and steal some of the autoguns from a 
Pred base and refit them on the Ark. It will be fun. Getting the guns 
would be dangerous, stupid, but fun none the less. Think of the 
possabilities."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus::
> 
> Ramulus frowns, looking around. "They didn't take anything. They 
just blew 
> the place up," he sighs, "The Ark was in ruins anyways. I think its 
time to 
> scrap it and build a new one or something."
